metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a bearded man sitting on a balustrade. He is wearing a long black coat, a shirt with a short tie, pants, and dark shoes. He is holding a walking stick in his right hand, and has his left hand in his pants pocket. On the left of the photograph there is a long black curtain. The photograph is titled and dated at the bottom.
